scenes.action_text: Chasing Amy Written by Kevin Smith 	INT. COMIC BOOK STORE - DAY 	A pile of COMIC BOOKS are on a shelf next to myriad others. The most prominent one is called BLUNTMAN AND CHRONIC'.  A hand reaches in and pulls one out of frame. HOLDEN opens the comic and flips through it He shakes his head.  BANKY looks over his shoulder. 					BANKY
